tool.name: EICExtractor
tool.description: Extracts intensities from dedicates positions in a LC/MS map
tool.command:
EICExtractor
-in #for token in $param_in: $token #end for -in_header #for token in $param_in_header: $token #end for #if $param_pos: -pos $param_pos #end if #if $param_rt_tol: -rt_tol $param_rt_tol #end if #if $param_mz_tol: -mz_tol $param_mz_tol #end if #if $param_rt_collect: -rt_collect $param_rt_collect #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_auto_rt_enabled: -auto_rt:enabled #end if #if $param_auto_rt_out_debug_TIC: -auto_rt:out_debug_TIC $param_auto_rt_out_debug_TIC #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_out_separator: -out_separator "$adv_opts.param_out_separator" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_auto_rt_FHWM: -auto_rt:FHWM $adv_opts.param_auto_rt_FHWM #end if #if $adv_opts.param_auto_rt_SNThreshold: -auto_rt:SNThreshold $adv_opts.param_auto_rt_SNThreshold #end if #end if

param.name: param_in_header
param.label: [for Waters data only] Read additional information from _HEADER.TXT
param.help: (-in_header) Provide one for each raw input file

param.name: param_pos
param.label: Input config file stating where to find signal

param.name: param_rt_tol
param.label: RT tolerance in [s] for finding max peak (whole RT range around RT middle)

param.name: param_mz_tol
param.label: m/z tolerance in [ppm] for finding a peak

param.name: param_rt_collect
param.label: # of scans up & down in RT from highest point for ppm estimation in result

param.name: param_auto_rt_enabled
param.label: Automatically detect injection peaks from TIC and quantify all m/z x RT combinations

param.name: param_out_separator
param.label: Separator character for output CSV file

param.name: param_auto_rt_FHWM
param.label: Expected full width at half-maximum of each raw RT peak in [s]
param.help: (-FHWM) Gaussian smoothing filter with this width is applied to TIC

param.name: param_auto_rt_SNThreshold
param.label: S/N threshold for a smoothed raw peak to pass peak picking
param.help: (-SNThreshold) Higher thesholds will result in less peaks

tool.help:
Extracts intensities from dedicates positions in a LC/MS map
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_EICExtractor.html
